title: Hellion

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, choose a player to strike. Deal a basic attack to them tonight and tommorow.
- At night, choose a player to hit with a Barbaric YAWP. They gain 3 stress, increased to 6 if they've killed a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can't perform any actions while you're performing either the first or second strike on a player.
- After killing a player, you stay home the next night and celebrate, unable to perform any action. You and all your visitors heal 2 stress.
- Barbaric YAWP can be fooled by frames.

desc:
Post 5328
*Beneath the bloodlust and fury, there is emptiness... and shame.*
